meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Tom Welter Gil H. Maureen Hart Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1138.

div.div: 1989 Senior Tournament quarterfinal game 3. Missing introductions and first segment.

td.p: Tom Welter, a quality controller from Anaheim, California

tr.td: THE 1955 EMMYS
BEN FRANKLIN
FLAGS
GUINNESS RECORDS
GERMANY
"PAL"s
